page.title: 06STAVERTON AIRPORT
page.content: The airport is owned jointly by Cheltenham Borough and Gloucester City Councils. It was opened on Thursday,July 16th, {1936}at 2:30p.m. by Rt.Hon.Viscount Swinton.Now,just over{100}planes land and take off during an average day.The freight planes used to fly from Staverton Airport but they stopped the use of freight planes early in 1985. Staverton Airport is a small airport and its largest passenger plane is a DC10.The{passenger}flights go to {Guernsey}and{Jersey}once a week on a Sunday.Occassionally they have crop sprayers,perhaps once a week. Staverton Airport has alot of {complaints}about low flying aircraft. The airport covers 384 acres and has ownership of a 50 acre farm.
